author: Ed Pauli
comment: Galaxy Gear S3 Frontier.  They really need to fix the syncing issue after the Tizen 3.0 update.  I have to uninstall and reinstall both the app and companion app everytime in order to get sync to work. Nothing else suggested works for me. And then it only works once.    If they fix this then it's a 5 star review.

author: Eshu Orishas
comment: This app has the BEST watch faces but they keep kicking me out of my Gear S3! This is a PAIN when the face goes back to one of the Galaxy faces! Thanks for the response, however it still kicks me back to the Samsung face. I'll upgrade the score because there are some GREAT faces but I would LIKE to USE them for extended time.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: Hi! Please make sure to update to the latest version of Facer on your watch by going to the Galaxy App store. The latest version there is 4.2.6. You may also want to make sure that location is enabled on your watch as having it disabled causes crashes on the latest Samsung firmware. Thanks!

author: Marsh Christmas
comment: The faces are awesome... i love the Swiss like sweeping hands but with my gear s3 4g I CAN'T use it.... Anytime i type with the watch the watch face resets to facer logo and freezes up... Am i the ONLY ONE??

author: Péter Antal
comment: +Very beautiful watchfaces. -The favorite section is only showes the last  250 favorited watches. -The shuffle mode is not working properly for the favorites section. -The Report an issue menuitem has removed from the Settings menu.

author: Kris Cayocca
comment: Ads interfere with installing watch faces, even those I've paid for. App frequently freezes and has to be restarted. Needs work.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! Ads on paid faces is definitely a bug which will be fixed in the coming days. Regarding the app freezes, could you shoot us an email at facer-support@little-labs.com with scenarios where you've seen this happen? Please use the reference number #23511 in your email so we know that it refers to this review. Thanks!

comment: Awesome app. I have never had  more fun changing watch faces! Huge selection of free faces and the paid ones are cheap and worth it.

author: rachel cosgrove
comment: Used to work fine .. now it's rubbish and don't load any faces to the watch. Gear 3 ..still not fixed  been rubbish for months on gear s3 please fix or I'm deleting it as it useless and don't work it's been updated and still the same

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Rachel!
Sorry about that - could you send us an email at facer-support@little-labs.com so we can try and fix this for you? You can mention your ticket number #22905 as reference.

author: Filipe Governa
comment: Can't rate watchfaces, no full-color ambient mode, doesn't vibrate hourly, must return to menu to go to next watchface, often doesn't vibrate when syncing watchfaces, poor business model/practices (paid for this, now it's free, no refund, rejected by Google, original dev, and current dev), spams you with unsolicited e-mails and notifications, and watchfaces often constantly blink indefinitely. Update 1: deducted 1 star because it lost all my watchfaces, can't re-import them, and support apparently is clueless and just ignores you.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content:
Hi Filipe,

Thank you so much for reaching out. I’ve made a note of your requests this it will be considered for a future update. We are always looking for input from our users on how to make Facer better so please let us know if there is anything else that comes to mind!

Best,
Little Labs

author: Elliott Smith
comment: All of the temp's on any weather watch face are off 8° to 10° wish for more outdoor watch faces.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: Hi there! Sorry about that, our servers got temporarily overloaded with excited new smartwatch users! This is now fixed and you should be able to access Facer again. If you're having issues, please try restarting the Facer app on your phone, and if that doesn't work, contact us at facer-support@little-labs.com. Thank you!!

author: Dinesh Correa
comment: The recent update is horrible for Samsung S3. Weather information just doesn't update.

author: Asa RocketShip
comment: This used to be cool. Now I can't sync any faces with my Gear S3.

author: Steven R.
comment: Paid for Facet Plus and still get adds with press to continue when clicking to view a watch face. Also, Plus does not grant you access to more watch faces. Not worth the 3.99.

author: P M
comment: They don't answer emails and charge u 3.99 for absolutely nothing in return.

author: Stacy Kasten
comment: Unable to use this app as when I try to download the companion app for my watch (Samsung gear 2), it says it is unavailable in the store.

author: Joel Matteis
comment: Not sure why I have to have ads. I spend a small fortune on watch faces. The app should get its revenue there. If I decide to not use facer, I also wouldn't be buying the faces so they lose twice.

author: Yaël Ax. Birenbaum Haligua
comment: Love the customisation and selection of faces but 1) the app is buggy and 2) my watch's battery is drained when displaying facer faces (incl. energy saving ones).

author: Delano Hill
comment: I paid for this app thinking I would be able to get watch faces easily, however I can't upload this Mickey Mouse face for some reason! 😢

author: Steve Jordan
comment: Weather temperature not showing up on Samsung Gear S3 since latest update.

author: Muhammad Ali Tipu
comment: Awsome look...nice display..work well with Android with fossil founder

author: Cynthia Lujano
comment: I just started using it so far I love it!!

author: Hasrat Guliyev
comment: It's best face app of Android watch.

author: stu bart
comment: Works great with my Huawei Watch 2.

author: Trisno Sidiq
comment: Nice app.many faces used on my wacth.

author: nasser alblooshi
comment: Thanks

author: Mary Beth Maynard
comment: Best there is !!!!

author: B Kerr
comment: I loved this app until you tried to force me to pay $3.99 for a lifetime membership or I can't even use the app at all bec the adds won't let it happen. Thanks fir ruining an awsome thing. I'll be going to the next great free watch app and appreciate ppls art and marketing there instead. 🖓

I have the Samsung Gear S3 Frontier watch and nothing shows up, outside of the time. Location, phone battery, and weather AREN'T working. I have uninstalled the app, reset my watch, turned my location and Bluetooth on and off and it still isn't working.

author: Michael Wainwright
comment: Where is a my purchases section?? Bought a starter pack and now I have to sift through 1000s of watch faces to find what I have bought? EDIT: I found the section. I'd probably move it to a better place. Added a star.

author: Tynia Keith
comment: Loved up till Sunday since Sunday I have not been able to upload any new watch faces. I've restarted and resync my watch and phone please fix
Really like the watch face selection, but the weather portion doesn't work on the faces I have and the download button for the free faces is always red.

author: Brian Compton
comment: Looks good, easy to use, but drains my watch battery far too fast.  Before Facer, my watch lasted from 0700 to midnight.  After Facer, my battery is dead at 1800.  Uninstalling.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: Hi! Sorry about that! Can you send us an email at facer-support@little-labs.com? We're currently investigating battery usage reports and would appreciate your help. Thanks!

author: Shawn Houska
comment: It won't sync with weather on a Galaxy Gear 3 Frontier I tried everything turn off Bluetooth and resetting the phone and watch and it still doesn't sync

author: Derek Vanover
comment: Looks nice and I believe it be a great app but anytime a click on something it crashes had to delete it

author: Robert Clark
comment: Buggy, unreliable, not worth the money to upgrade.

author: Marc van den berg
comment: Facer on Galaxy store still not updated to version 4.2.7?

author: andrei victor
comment: used until 3 days ago but now it is not working.No watch face can be installed

author: Jacob Himmelspach
comment: Way too many ads.

author: Damien Albitres
comment: Really nice faces, but huge battery killer

author: Sammy Sok
comment: Dopest app to get aftermarket watch faces for hands down!

author: mike metzger
comment: Will there be support for Samsung's newest watches?
